AppTitle: SMART: Statistical Metrics and Reporting Tool
SetItemTypesNote: (All items are assumed 'Multiple Choice'. Click to change item types.)
MCKeyPasteHelp1: Paste answers IN ORDER for the following __N__ multiple-choice items.
TFKeyPasteHelp1: Paste answers IN ORDER for the following __N__ true/false items.
LCNote: Note: For long-answer items, values in the dataset must be the score the student received.
Overall_ptxt_low: Average difficulty is low; most items are hard.
Overall_ptxt_mid: Average difficulty is moderate; test difficulty is balanced.
Overall_ptxt_high: Average difficulty is high; most items are easy.
Overall_rtxt_low: Average discrimination is low; items may not distinguish well.
Overall_rtxt_high: Average discrimination is high; items distinguish well.
DistractorNeedsMCAndKey: For this analysis, the item must be multiple-choice and have an answer key.
DistractorMsg_OK: The correct option is chosen more by high-performing students. The item is functioning correctly (as expected).
DistractorMsg_NotOK: The correct option is not more frequent among high performers (The key or the item should be reviewed).
DistractorMsg_OkDistractors: Distractors are chosen more by low-performing students (as expected).
DistractorMsg_BadDistractorsPrefix: Distractors that are misleading or where the item stem might cause misunderstanding:
SummaryNotReady: Summary could not be generated. Please check data and answer keys.
ReportsIntro: Click below to download reports as DOCX.
ReportsNote: (Depending on dataset size, this may take a while.)
NoMCForDistractor: No multiple-choice item available for analysis.
comment_overall.difficulty.low: Average difficulty is low, meaning most questions are hard. This implies that the mean score may be low.
comment_overall.difficulty.high: Average difficulty is high, meaning most questions are easy. In this case, the test may struggle to distinguish between knowledgeable and unknowledgeable students.
comment_overall.difficulty.mid: Average difficulty is moderate, indicating a balanced level of exam difficulty.
comment_overall.discrimination.low: Average discrimination is low, meaning items may be weak at distinguishing between knowledgeable and unknowledgeable students.
comment_overall.discrimination.high: Average discrimination is high, meaning items adequately distinguish between knowledgeable and unknowledgeable students.
comment_overall.discrimination.mid: Average discrimination is moderate, meaning items partly distinguish between knowledgeable and unknowledgeable students.
ItemComment_Line1: As difficulty approaches 1.00, the item is easier; as it approaches 0.00, it is harder.
ItemComment_Line2: The discrimination coefficient reflects the item's correlation with the weighted total (corrected itemâ€“total).
ItemComment_Line3: The Item Reliability Index is the item's correlation with the weighted total; higher values indicate a positive contribution.
ReportError: Report could not be generated. Error Message:
NeedItemTypesKeys: Please specify item types and provide answer keys.
FileReadError: File could not be read. Please check CSV format and delimiter/encoding settings.
